title: Hide Pictures, Hide Photos & Videos, Gallery Vault
description:
Hide photos, hide pictures, hide videos in private gallery vault app.
Hide Pictures & Videos - the ultimate private gallery app on Google Play
Hide photos app – all your private photos stored in a Vault Gallery. Hide Photos and Videos in private Gallery and securely
backup your data in the Cloud
. Share private data among multiple devices. Use Fake Crash dialog to mimic application error.
Take control and keep your private stuff really private with number one private Vault Gallery app.
Protect your call & image experience, caller information on calls and easy after call menu for image protection. Take control of your hidden images. Convenient gallery vault protector in your after call menu. Protect your valuable data directly from the call screens any day - everyday.
This app uses the Device Administrator permission. This permission is required to enable "Prevent Uninstall" option. If Prevent uninstall option is activated no-one will be able to uninstall the app except you.
Main Features:
★Vault & Call protector: Protect your phone and belongings directly from the call screens.
★ Vault Photo Gallery
★ Hide Pictures, photos and Videos.
★ Private Gallery: Store your private pictures, photos and videos in FotoX Gallery.
★ Fake Crash dialog unlock. Mimic that your app has crashed.
★ FotoX cloud (premium) enables you to securely store all your private Images and Videos in the cloud and to transfer the data between multiple devices.
★ Break In Attempts. Every time someone enters wrong pin code or creates wrong pattern, FotoX app will record and store this attempt.
★ Advanced Security. Once this option is activated, no one will be able to uninstall the FotoX except you. Normal uninstall procedure will be disabled.
★ Password Recovery. In case that you forget your pin code or pattern you will always be able to reset existing lock and regain access to FotoX app.
Thank you for using Hide Pictures & Videos
